enter_username_manually: Enter your Instagram username manually and start the analysis.
ready_to_analyze: Now we can analyze people who don't follow you back. Start analysis for detailed report.
data_retrieval_error: An error occurred while retrieving data.
onboarding_welcome_desc: Analyze your Instagram account to easily discover users who don't follow you back and organize your following lists.
onboarding_features_desc: Follower analysis, comparative lists, search and filtering options to take full control of your account.
onboarding_privacy_desc: Your data is completely safe! The app works directly in your browser, we don't store any of your personal information on our servers.
onboarding_security_desc: Read and accept important information to use the app safely. The security of your Instagram account is under your control.
onboarding_risk_title: Terms of Use and Important Information
onboarding_risk_1: • This app analyzes Instagram's publicly available data
onboarding_risk_2: • Use carefully to avoid exceeding Instagram's usage limits
onboarding_risk_3: • Avoid frequent analysis (no more than 2-3 times per day)
onboarding_risk_4: • The security of your account is entirely your responsibility
onboarding_checkbox: I have read and accept the terms of use
privacy_technical_content:
Our application works completely browser-based:

• Analysis is performed directly in your browser with JavaScript
• Your Instagram data is never sent to our servers
• Username and password are not stored
• All data is temporarily kept in browser memory only during analysis
• Data is automatically deleted when analysis is completed
• Uses Instagram's official web interface, no unauthorized access
security_technical_content:
To ensure your account security:

• Works in compliance with Instagram's rate limit rules
• Sends maximum 50 requests per minute
• Places random waiting times between requests
• Automatically stops if abnormal activity is detected
• Makes no changes to your account, only reads
• Designed not to trigger Instagram's security systems

IMPORTANT: Perform maximum 2-3 analyses per day!
security_guide_subtitle: Learn how to use the app safely and effectively
how_it_works_desc: This app analyzes your Instagram data directly in your browser without sending any information to external servers.
how_it_works_technical_content:
The application works as follows:

1. Uses Instagram's official website
2. Reads page content using your browser's Developer API
3. Gets follower and following lists with JavaScript
4. Performs mathematical comparison
5. Shows results in your browser

All processing happens locally, internet connection is only used to access Instagram.
safety_tips_technical_content:
To protect your account:

• Perform maximum 2-3 analyses per day
• Wait at least 2 hours between analyses
• Don't run on multiple browser tabs simultaneously
• Don't analyze after logging out of Instagram
• If using VPN, always select the same location
• Don't use on shared computers
• Log out of Instagram after analysis
tip_2: Use the app responsibly to avoid Instagram limits
tip_4: Log out when finished using the app
data_privacy_technical_content:
Measures we take to protect your data:

• No personal data is stored
• Username is temporarily kept in browser memory
• No access to your password is ever provided
• Analysis data is only used for result display
• All data is deleted when you log out
• No data sharing with third parties
• Secure connection with HTTPS encryption
• Cookies used only for session management
privacy_1: All analysis happens locally in your browser
privacy_2: We don't store any of your Instagram data
privacy_3: No personal information is sent to servers
use_responsibly: Use responsibly to avoid Instagram limits
take_a_break: Take a break to avoid Instagram limits
ad_loading_desc: Please watch the short ad to see analysis results
ad_failed_desc: Ad could not be loaded, continuing with analysis...
